description: Users of Windows Media applications may experience severe security-related impacts, including unexpected application crashes, system instability, and unresponsive interfaces when exploited. This is especially prevalent in affected builds such as Windows 10 (versions 21H2 and 22H2) with build numbers [10, 0, 19041, 3803] and [10, 0, 19045, 3803]. This issue is documented under KB article IDs KB-5033369 and KB-5033375, indicating that users need to be vigilant against suspicious files that may lead to exploitation. It is essential for system administrators to assess their environments for the implications of this vulnerability as it could lead to compromised system integrity.
